bibl.title: Alexander's Dialogue with Indian Philosophers: Riddle in Greek and Indian Tradition.
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 13044 (= M.-P.3 2068; LDAB 6897). - 1. Versions of the Dialogue / Variants of Questions. - 2. Greek Riddles. - 3. The oldest Riddle in India. - 4. Riddles in the Mahābhārata. - 3 [sic, lire: 5]. Indian Doctrine? - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Aleksandra Szalc, Alexander's Dialogue with Indian Philosophers: Riddle in Greek and Indian Tradition.
